OOC for everyone on the bottom.

::Dion::

Dion listens to one of the Decepticons address Pacifix and smiles, lifting his rifle and firing three blasts at the trees around the retreating Decepticons as they begin to fly off. The trees explode, sending alot of spliters of wood flying at flyers.

(Ok, when my posts start getting this bad, its time to go to sleep :-)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
OOC:

Allrighty, I've changed the stuff on the site. Jer, you should be able to see the council message board when you log in now.

So far its 2-to-one in favor of 3-month terms. Anyone else have an opinion?



--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers@t... wrote:
> Crotale got up after Pacifix.  "Good thing I did come, not even an 
> hour on this planet and you were almost dead." he said smugly to 
> his companion.  Walking up the hill behind Pacifix he pulled out his 
> mingun. Standing silently beside Pacifix.  
> 
> Slag saw Crossroads trying to help up Grimlock.  He walked over 
> and tried to slap the bot out of the way.  "Dinobots no need help 
> from weaklings." he said.
> 
> JetV sat, hidden in the bushes.  "Artemis " he whispered " don't let 
> yourself be revieled.  Pacifix wants us to follow them unknown."
> 
> -----------
> 
> Tremor had Slugslinger under his arm, straining to carry him.  
> Walking backwards, he kept swinging his combined gun of Zigzag 
> and Heater around at different bots.  As he got to the edge of the 
> clearing he looked straight at Pacifix.  "They must all train you the 
> same, Autobot, you are as stupid for letting us go as that idiot 
> leader Prime was.  "  he said with a sly smile.  Then turning and 
> jumping into the air flying west.  
> 
> ----------------------------
> 
> JetV followed behind, in the undergroath of the forest.
